    • Method Detail

      • registerGeneralCallback

        void registerGeneralCallback(IInputCallback callback)
        Registers the given callback for general events. If the callback is already registered it won't be registered again.
        Parameters:
        callback -

      • unregisterGeneralCallback

        boolean unregisterGeneralCallback(IInputCallback callback)
        Unregisters the given callback.
        Parameters:
        callback -
        Returns:
        True if the callback was registered before, false if not.

      • hasGeneralCallback

        boolean hasGeneralCallback(IInputCallback callback)
        Returns whether the given callback is registered or not.
        Parameters:
        callback -
        Returns:
        True if the callback is registered, false if not.
